title: Hanes Men's Heavyweight Pocket T-Shirt, Beefy-T Full-Cut Cotton Pocket Tee for Men, Crewneck T-Shirt For Men, 1 or 2 Pack
description: WONDERFULLY WEIGHTY COTTON - Heavyweight 6.1 oz. ringspun cotton combines substance and softness.
A LITTLE ROOMIER - More room to move through the body.
A CLASSIC CREWNECK - Ribbed crewneck lays flat and holds its shape.
QUALITY IN EVERY STITCH - Sturdy double-needle stitching at the sleeves and hem.
COMFORT IN THE DETAILS - No-chafe shoulder-to-shoulder inside taping reinforces the shape.
COLORS GALORE - From bold to bright to basic, this pocket tee comes in colors to suit every taste.
Hanes mens Heavyweight Pocket T-shirt, Beefy-t Full-cut Cotton Pocket Tee for Men, Crewneck T-shirt for Men
